A kamatos kamat a világ nyolcadik csodáj:
Compound interest is the eighth wonder of the world. 
 He who understands it, earns it... he who doesn't, pays it.
Kamatos kamat alatt azt értjük, amikor n: Compound interest refers to when not only our initial capital earns interest, but the interest received after our capital also earns interest further.
Ez azt jelenti, hogy a tőkénk után kapot: This means that the interest received after our capital is not paid out after a certain period, but is added to our capital, and this amount continues to earn interest.
A hétköznapokban számos fontos pénzügyi: In everyday life, you can encounter the concept of compound interest in many important financial decisions - e.g., when choosing a savings account, taking out a loan, or making investments.
Ha érted ennek működését, akkor megalapo: If you understand how it works, you can make informed and advantageous financial decisions.
Ha azonban a kamatos kamat ismeretlen fo: However, if compound interest is an unfamiliar concept to you, you can easily encounter decisions that you feel the negative effects of for years.
Mi a kamatos kamat és miért jó neked?: What is compound interest and why is it good for you?
Miért fontos a kamatos kamat és hol talá: Why is compound interest important and where can you encounter it?
